ComicInfo.Summary: After murdering the ruler of the City of Thieves, the HellSpawn Covenant is thrown into a dark prison where something strange is happening in the shadows. He is trapped, alone and the scent of slaughter is thick in the air. Meanwhile, in the northern woods of Britain, Gareth, the Druid priest has fallen under mysterious attack. Something was waiting in the woods; something that wanted Gareth's stolen necroplasm for itself.
ComicInfo.Title: Voices In The Dark
